props.name: minMaxSizes
props.description: A min-max size range. Examples: "11-50"". For now, only single range is supported.

props.name: domain
props.description: The domain of the company to find.

predict-leads_find_company_job_openings.description: Retrieves job openings by company domain.

props.name: active_only
props.description: Set to true if you'd like to receive JobOpenings that are not closed, have last_seen_at more recent than 5 days and were found in the last year

props.name: not_closed
props.description: Similar to active_only, but without considering last_seen_at timestamp.

props.name: with_description_only
props.description: Only return JobOpenings that have description

props.name: with_location_only
props.description: Only return JobOpenings that have location

props.name: categories
props.description: Select categories to filter job openings

props.name: jobOpeningId
props.description: The ID of the job opening to retrieve.

props.name: onet_codes
props.description: O*NET codes to filter by, such as "17-2071.00" for "Electrical Engineers" or "15-1254.00" for "Web Developers". For full list of possible codes see: https://www.onetonline.org/find/all

predict-leads_find_news_by_domain.description: Retrieves news events by company domain

props.name: domain
props.description: The domain of the company to find.

props.name: found_at_from
props.description: Only return data first seen after given date . Example 2024-09-25

props.name: found_at_until
props.description: Only return data first seen before given date . Example 2024-09-25

props.name: categories
props.description: The categories of news to find.

props.name: id
props.description: The ID of the news event to find.

predict-leads_find_technologies_by_domai.description: Retrieve technologies used by specific company

props.name: domain
props.description: The domain of the company to find.

props.name: id
props.description: The ID of the technology to find.
